name: zemdomu
description: A semantic linter for HTML and JSX/TSX with cross-component analysis

commands.title: ZemDomu: Scan Workspace for Semantic Issues

zemdomu.run.description:
When to run semantic linting:
• onSave — after each file save
• onType — as you type
• manual — only via the Scan Workspace command
• disabled — never run automatically

zemdomu.crossComponentAnalysis.description: Analyze and detect semantic issues across component boundaries

zemdomu.rules.requireSectionHeading.description: Warn when a <section> has no heading.

zemdomu.rules.enforceHeadingOrder.description: Warn if heading levels skip (e.g. <h3> after <h1> without <h2>).

zemdomu.rules.singleH1.description: Warn if more than one <h1> is used in a document.

zemdomu.rules.requireAltText.description: Warn when an tag is missing a non-empty alt attribute.

zemdomu.rules.requireLabelForFormControl.description: Warn when a form control (input, select, textarea) doesn't have an associated label.

zemdomu.rules.enforceListNesting.description: Warn when an <li> element is not a direct child of <ul> or <ol>.

zemdomu.rules.requireLinkText.description: Warn when an <a> tag doesn't contain any text content.

zemdomu.rules.requireTableCaption.description: Warn when a <table> is missing a <caption> element.

zemdomu.rules.preventEmptyInlineTags.description: Warn when inline tags (strong, em, b, i, etc.) are empty.

zemdomu.rules.requireHrefOnAnchors.description: Warn when an <a> tag is missing a non-empty href attribute.
